DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to assess the long term safety of Dysport in hemiparetic subjects with lower limb spasticity due to stroke or traumatic brain injury over repeated treatment cycles.
DOC.brief_title: Dysport® Adult Lower Limb Spasticity Follow-on Study
DOC.criteria: Completion of Dysport® Adult Lower Limb Spasticity Double Blind study Y5552120140 (NCT01249404) Fixed contractures in lower limb
